name: solr-client
description: A Solr client library for indexing, adding, deleting, committing, optimizing and searching documents within an Apache Solr installation (version>=3.2)

scripts.test: mocha -R spec test/*-test.js && mocha -R spec test/*-test.js
scripts.test-cov: jscoverage lib lib-cov && ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha -R html-cov test/*-test.js > coverage.html && rm -r lib-cov
scripts.report: rm -rf report && mkdir report && plato -r -d report main.js lib/*
